title: Chicken with mango salsa
ingredients: ['2 (425g) tins pineapple pieces in fruit juice, drained with juice reserved', '2 mangos - peeled, stone removed and diced', '2 green chillies, seeded and diced', 'handful chopped fresh coriander', '8 tablespoons freshly squeezed lime juice and pulp', '8 tablespoons fresh orange juice', '4 tablespoons dark rum', '1 clove garlic, minced', '8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves']
